complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the creation of the audio_service.py module into subtasks covering voice generation, audio extraction, R2 storage integration, and module structure/interfaces.

complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Implementing audio extraction with ffmpeg involves external dependencies and file operations, which adds complexity. Proper error handling and testing will be important.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Audio Track Toggle and Volume Control
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for implementing the track toggle button, volume slider, integrating with audio hooks, and handling user interactions. Include subtasks for UI design and testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Implementing the audio track toggle and volume control requires integrating UI elements with the audio hooks and handling user interactions. Ensuring a smooth user experience adds some complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the waveform visualization development into subtasks for extracting waveform data, rendering on canvas, implementing different views, and optimizing performance. Include subtasks for testing and integration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating the waveform visualization component involves complex canvas rendering and optimizing performance for multiple tracks. Integrating with the audio hooks and handling different views adds further complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the expandable timeline implementation into subtasks for creating the toggle functionality, handling layout changes, integrating with the waveform visualization, and ensuring responsiveness. Include subtasks for testing and refinement.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Implementing the expandable timeline requires careful management of layout changes and integration with the waveform visualization. Ensuring a smooth and responsive user experience adds complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for implementing drag-and-drop functionality, handling track positioning, integrating with the audio track manager, providing visual feedback, and optimizing performance. Include subtasks for edge case handling and extensive testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Adding draggable voiceover tracks involves complex user interactions, precise positioning calculations, and real-time visual feedback. Ensuring smooth performance and handling various edge cases significantly increases the complexity.

Include subtasks for bug fixing and refinement.
